Package Model.Game

Class Field

java.lang.Object
Model.Game.Field
Direct Known Subclasses:
GamePlay
public class Field extends Object
Game Field class, provides only game grid

    • spawnBricks

      protected void spawnBricks(int brick, int powerUp)
      Spawn bricks. Bricks must be at least one more than power ups
      Parameters:
      brick - the number of bricks to spawn
      powerUp - the number of power up to spawn
